name: fsl_glm
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Simple GLM allowing temporal or spatial regression on either text data or images

inputs.description: Input file name (text matrix or 3D/4D image file)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: File name of the GLM design matrix (text time courses for temporal regression or an image file for spatial regression)
inputs.name: Design matrix

inputs.description: Output file name for GLM parameter estimates (GLM betas)
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Matrix of t-statistics contrasts
inputs.name: Contrasts

inputs.description: Mask image file name if input is image
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Set degrees-of-freedom explicitly
inputs.name: Degrees-of-freedom

inputs.description: Switch on normalisation of the design matrix columns to unit std. deviation
inputs.name: Design normalisation flag

inputs.description: Switch on normalisation of the data time series to unit std. deviation
inputs.name: Data normalisation flag

inputs.description: Perform MELODIC variance-normalisation on data
inputs.name: Variance normalisation flag

inputs.description: Switch on de-meaning of design and data
inputs.name: De-mean flag

inputs.description: Output file name for COPEs (either as text file or image)
inputs.name: Output COPEs file

inputs.description: Output file name for Z-stats (either as text file or image)
inputs.name: Output Z-stats file

inputs.description: Output file name for t-stats (either as text file or image)
inputs.name: Output t-stats file

inputs.description: Output file name for p-values of Z-stats (either as text file or image)
inputs.name: Output p-values file

inputs.description: Output file name for F-value of full model fit
inputs.name: Output F-value file

inputs.description: Output file name for p-value for full model fit
inputs.name: Output p-value file

inputs.description: Output file name for residuals
inputs.name: Output residuals file

inputs.description: Output file name for variance of COPEs
inputs.name: Output variance of COPEs file

inputs.description: Output file name for residual noise variance sigma-square
inputs.name: Output sigma-square variance file

inputs.description: Output file name for pre-processed data
inputs.name: Output pre-processed data

inputs.description: Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation
inputs.name: Output variance normalisation scales file

inputs.description: List of text files containing text matrix confounds. Caution, BETA option.
inputs.name: VXT confounds

inputs.description: List of 4D images containing voxelwise confounds. Caution, BETA option.
inputs.name: VXF confounds

inputs.description: Display this help text
inputs.name: Help flag

groups.description: Optional output files for FSL GLM
groups.name: Optional Output Files

output-files.description: Output file name for GLM parameter estimates (GLM betas)
output-files.name: Output file

output-files.description: Output file name for COPEs (either as text file or image)
output-files.name: Output COPEs file

output-files.description: Output file name for Z-stats (either as text file or image)
output-files.name: Output Z-stats file

output-files.description: Output file name for t-stats (either as text file or image)
output-files.name: Output t-stats file

output-files.description: Output file name for p-values of Z-stats (either as text file or image)
output-files.name: Output p-values file

output-files.description: Output file name for F-value of full model fit
output-files.name: Output F-value file

output-files.description: Output file name for p-value for full model fit
output-files.name: Output p-value file

output-files.description: Output file name for variance of COPEs
output-files.name: Output variance of COPEs file

output-files.description: Output file name for residual noise variance sigma-square
output-files.name: Output sigma-square variance file

output-files.description: Output file name for pre-processed data
output-files.name: Output pre-processed data

output-files.description: Output file name for scaling factors for variance normalisation
output-files.name: Output variance normalisation scales file
